1.0.name: wordpress/google-custom-search-for-wordpress
1.0.description:
The default search engine that ships with WordPress is not the best search engine and bloggers every where should make the switch to WordPress Google Custom Search plugin. This plugin is a drop in replacement and works with minimum hassle. See a working Demo.

Features

  • Replaces all default WordPress search forms to point to Google Custom Search (thanks to a new hook in WordPress 2.7)
  • Adds a new search page on your blog at /search/
  • Converts the default /?s= URL to a search engine friendly /search/ URL
  • Allows you to make money off clickthroughs on Google ads in the search results
